name: Red Pepper Coulis
keywords: dairy-free, gluten-free, low-fat, nut-free, vegan, vegetarian, red bell pepper, tomato, tomato juice
recipeIngredient: 1/2 pound red peppers, cored, seeded and diced

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium-size skillet, combine red pepper, tomato, onion and tomato juice and cook until tender. Stir in the basil and thyme. Puree in a blender until smooth. Return to skillet and cook over low heat until mixture is reduced to about 1 1/2 cups.
